description:
# Mellow

A V2Ray client that can handle all TCP/UDP/ICMP traffic with domain/IP/app rules.

More about official description at [README](https://github.com/mellow-io/mellow/blob/237712977d855f3a578178af16d03daab671e044/README.en.md)

更多官方描述请移步至 [README](https://github.com/mellow-io/mellow/blob/master/README.md)
summary: Mellow is a rule-based global transparent proxy client for Windows, macOS and Linux.
author: mellow-io
